attributes.action: prioritise Celvapan H1N1 vaccine for pregnant women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please make the Celvapan H1N1 vaccine a priority for pregnant women who want to avoid the use of Adjuvants (not tested on pregnant women) and Thiomersal (a preservative containing mercury).

University College London vaccine expert Dr Tarit Mukhopadhyay said there was no evidence of harm from adjuvants, but added that in the absence of formal clinical trials in pregnancy, they should not be used.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
